name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Meet Timer - Clock, Agenda, Countdown

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customizable Timers, Countdowns, Clocks, Agendas & Stopwatches easily shared directly in your Google Meet meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⏱ Customizable Timers, Countdowns, Clocks, Agendas & Stopwatches easily shared directly in your Google Meet meetings & conferences.  

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Trusted by 50,000+ organizations

Features:
😃 Easily displayed to participants without them installing the extension
🔊 Audio alerts keep your meetings on track
👀 Multiple display options to keep the timer visible to your Meet participants
🎨 Timer customization to fit your unique meeting needs
🔄 Cycle timers automatically
😌 Saved templates for easy re-use
🤝 Easily grant timer access to a designated Timekeeper
🔒 Built securely. Timer does not transmit or save meeting data 🙋‍♀️ 24 hour support team is here to help

Simple Timers: Start a simple timer to help manage a presentation, pitch, or discussion. Count down or count up to any specified time. Colors automatically change as the timer gets closer to zero to help keep the speaker on track.

Agenda Timers: Display an entire meeting agenda with timed segments for each portion of the meeting.

Clocks: Display the current time so you so you can stay on track while presenting.


How does it work?
1. The BlueSky Timer Bar will appear at the top of your Google Meet meetings. Simply click "Connect" and you'll be taken to the BlueSky Control Center.

2. Once the BlueSky Control center is opened, simply click to customize your timer. Select between simple timers, agendas, and clocks. Customize the display, set audio alerts, and more.

3. Start and stop the timer easily from within Google Meet. Note that the BlueSky Control Center tab must remain open in order to share video with your participants. 


Try it free today!
